languages.text: {n}Мастер дисциплины повинно склоняет голову, в ее глазах — ярость и стыд.{/n} "Прошу, Лорд-капитан, накажите меня по всей строгости за столь непростительную оплошность!"
{n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер дисциплины повинно склоняет голову, в ее глазах — ярость и стыд.{/n} "Прошу, Лорд-капитан, накажите меня по всей строгости за столь непростительную оплошность!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms obediently bows her had, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, punish me for such an ignominious transgression!"
{n}The Master-at-Arms obediently bows her had, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, punish me for such an ignominious transgression!"
{n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"
{n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"
{n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"
{n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"

languages.text: {n}La capitaine d'armes incline la tête en signe d'obéissance, mais ses yeux brûlent de rage et de honte.{/n} « Je vous en conjure, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, vous devez me châtier pour cette ignominie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La capitaine d'armes incline la tête en signe d'obéissance, mais ses yeux brûlent de rage et de honte.{/n} « Je vous en conjure, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, vous devez me châtier pour cette ignominie ! »

languages.text: {n}La maestra de armas agacha la cabeza en sumisión, con una mirada ardiente de furia y vergüenza.{/n} «¡Por favor, Lord Capitán, se lo ruego! ¡Castígueme por esta ignominiosa afrenta!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de armas agacha la cabeza en sumisión, con una mirada ardiente de furia y vergüenza.{/n} «¡Por favor, Lord Capitán, se lo ruego! ¡Castígueme por esta ignominiosa afrenta!».

languages.text: {n}戒律大师顺从地低下了头，目光中充斥着愤怒与羞愧的火焰。{/n}“舰长大人，我犯下了可耻的罪过，请您惩罚我吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"

traits.locale_text: {n}戒律大师顺从地低下了头，目光中充斥着愤怒与羞愧的火焰。{/n}“舰长大人，我犯下了可耻的罪过，请您惩罚我吧！”

languages.text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは、怒りと羞恥を目に浮かべながら、従順に頭を下げた。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン、お願いします。どうかこの不名誉な罪を罰してください！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは、怒りと羞恥を目に浮かべながら、従順に頭を下げた。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン、お願いします。どうかこの不名誉な罪を罰してください！」

languages.text: {n}Die Master-at-Arms senkt gehorsam den Kopf. In ihren Augen brennen Zorn und Scham.{/n} "Bitte, Lord Captain, ich flehe Euch an, mich für diesen schändlichen Verstoß zu bestrafen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Master-at-Arms senkt gehorsam den Kopf. In ihren Augen brennen Zorn und Scham.{/n} "Bitte, Lord Captain, ich flehe Euch an, mich für diesen schändlichen Verstoß zu bestrafen!"

languages.text: {n}Silahtar, başını itaatkârca önüne eğiyor. Gözleri öfke ve utançla yanıyor.{/n} "Lütfen Lord Kaptan, bu yüz karartıcı suçtan ötürü beni cezalandırmanız için yalvarıyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms bows her head in obedience, her eyes burning with rage and shame.{/n} "Please, Lord Captain, I beg you to punish me for this ignominious transgression!"
